attributes.background: Replace Theresa May with Jacob Rees Mogg  as PM to lead into Brexit.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. 

In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

The Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that has the most seats. You can find out more about this here:

https://www.royal.uk/queen-and-government
